Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's probably my wife, Prima, you'll be
dealing with.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>Every time I show my face around there,
she demands to know why I'm not wearing
<clr:0000>Cece-brand<clr:ffff> clothes.<sp:0:4:0>So I'm keeping my distance until the fad
dies down.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I never knew my dear Prima was the type to get so
worked up about fashion.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_3001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Work_00>Oh, it's you. <sp:5:0:0>Hey.<sp:0:4:0>My wife hasn't let go of her obsession
with <clr:0000>some kind of treasure<clr:ffff> she heard
about from a fellow Cece-loving guest.<sp:0:4:0>Ever since, it's been up to me to keep this
place running.
Talk_14:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Not so loud...the customer will hear you. Besides,
you can't pout when you're wearing that cute
outfit. It spoils the effect.<sp:0:4:0>I don't need alone time as long as I get to stand
here and work the counter with you.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>If you have inn business, they'll take care
of you at the counter.
Talk_3002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>What's this <clr:0000>treasure<clr:ffff> supposed to
be, anyway?<sp:0:4:0>Is she after the <clr:0000>Great Bandit Misko's
treasure<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>Nah...everyone knows that's
just a myth.
talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Yeaaah, so...<sp:5:1:0> A regular bed is <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:1:0>
while a soft bed costs...<sp:5:1:0><clr:0000>30 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_15:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Listen, the quicker we take care of this customer,
the sooner we can get back to alone time. So do
your thing, Prima!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Can't talk now. I'm on my way to relieve
my wife, Prima, at work.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>Every time I show my face around there,
she demands to know why I'm not wearing
<clr:0000>Cece-brand<clr:ffff> clothes.<sp:0:4:0>So I'm keeping my distance until the fad
dies down.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I never knew my dear Prima was the type to get so
worked up about fashion.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_3003:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I know she said she was having second thoughts
after the mayoral election, but her passion for
fashion hasn't seemed to fade one bit.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know, before I worked here, I was
a customer. But then I got married and
started to help run the place.<sp:0:4:0>I'm about to go relieve my wife at the
counter, so if you want to talk business,
we can do it once I settle in.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Every time I show my face around there,
she demands to know why I'm not wearing
<clr:0000>Cece-brand<clr:ffff> clothes.<sp:0:4:0>So I'm keeping my distance until the fad
dies down.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh, but I've been talking your ear off.
Are you staying here?
talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>How did you like the soft bed? Nice, huh?<sp:5:0:0>
All right, then, safe travels!
talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>How did you like the soft bed? Nice, huh?<sp:5:0:0>
All right, then, safe travels!
talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Take it from me—a soft bed is way more
comfy than a regular one.<sp:0:4:0>You'll wake up ready to walk halfway
across Hyrule. There's nothing like it
for the stamina a traveler needs.
talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Ooh. <sp:5:0:0>You're a little short today.
Sorry, brother.
talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>How long do you want to sleep on that
regular bed?
talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>How long do you want to sleep on that
soft bed?
Talk_2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there. Welgum to Ton Pu Inn...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>Haha, whoops! Tripped over my own
tongue there.<sp:0:4:0>I was a traveler myself until not too long
ago, so I'm still getting the hang of this
innkeeper stuff.<sp:0:4:0>Never thought I'd give up the wandering
lifestyle—for the girl who ran the inn,
no less!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired>Although now, every time I show my face
around there, she demands to know why
I'm not wearing <clr:0000>Cece-brand<clr:ffff> clothes.<sp:0:4:0>So I'm keeping my distance until the fad
dies down.
Talk_2003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've got nothing against <clr:0000>Cece-brand<clr:ffff> stuff.
It looks great on my wife.<sp:0:4:0>The trouble starts when she insists that I
wear <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff> outfits too.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Just thinking about looking like that gives
me the shivers.
talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Did you sleep OK? <sp:5:1:0>Great. Safe travels,
brother!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Hey, c'mon. <sp:5:0:0>Quit fooling around. <sp:5:0:0>You're
going to weird out the other customers.
talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Did you sleep OK? <sp:5:1:0>Great. Safe travels,
brother!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Sorry. They told me during my training
that if you want to stay here, you have
to settle up at the counter.
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there, brother!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Oh, if you don't know me, I'm a worker
at the inn.<sp:0:4:0>Whoever's at the counter right now can
help you out if you need something.
talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Did you sleep OK? <sp:5:1:0>Great. Safe travels,
brother!
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know, before I worked here, I was
a customer. But then I got married and
started to help run the place.<sp:0:4:0>I'm on break right now though, so if
you're looking for a place to stay, you
should go ask at the counter.<sp:0:4:0>It's probably my wife, Prima, you'll be
dealing with.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>Every time I show my face around there,
she demands to know why I'm not wearing
<clr:0000>Cece-brand<clr:ffff> clothes.<sp:0:4:0>So I'm keeping my distance until the fad
dies down.
Talk_3000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Work_00>Hey there.<sp:0:4:0>Prima—that's my wife—is obsessed with
some kind of <clr:0000>treasure<clr:ffff> she heard about
from a fellow Cece-loving guest.<sp:0:4:0>Ever since, it's been up to me to keep this
place running.
talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>How did you like the soft bed? Nice, huh?<sp:5:0:0>
All right, then, safe travels!
Talk_13: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Aww. Is that it for our alone time?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
